doc.title: Changeover
doc.plot: A man (Joe Marzano) gets off a train at a suburb changeover point and indulges in a fantasy about an attractive woman (Lydia Day) he watches for a few moments on the opposite track. A year after this film short was made, Marzano included it in his 18-minute _Trilogy (1961)_ (qv) along with _Return (1961)_ (qv) and _Lovelost (1961)_ (qv).
